forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds NW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds NW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Gusty winds early. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Gusty winds early. Low 41F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable.
